input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Fit Wrinkle-Free Kennebunk Sport Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Traditional Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Long-Sleeve Plaid Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Dress Shirt Slim Fit'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Cotton Blend Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Steel Slim Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='&Collar Men's Slim Fit Moisture-Wicking Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Trim Fit Premium Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Point Collar Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's BeanFlex Twill Long-Sleeve Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Signature Stretch Poplin Shirt'
  - Name='Awearness Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Ultra Performance Stretch Dobby Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Traditional Fit Herringbone Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Knit Button Up Shirt'
  - Name='Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Short-Sleeve Performance Shirt'
  - Name='Nordstrom Trim Fit Microcheck Cotton Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Chambray Shirt'
  - Name='Van Heusen Men's Classic Fit Solid Poplin Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Brushed Jasp√© Twill Shirt'
  - Name='Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Ultra Performance Stretch Plaid Dress Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's VentureStretch Woven Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Slightly Fitted Moleskin Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Cloud Gauze Short-Sleeve Shirt'
  - Name='L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Oxford Short-Sleeve'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Fit Wrinkle-Free Kennebunk Sport Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a traditional fit wrinkle-free sport shirt, similar in wrinkle resistance but likely more casual in style and purpose than a dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Traditional Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A traditional fit non-iron dress shirt closely matches the reference product's fabric technology and dress shirt category, though differing in fit (traditional vs trim/standard).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Long-Sleeve Plaid Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is an untucked fit shirt with a plaid pattern, more casual and likely less formal than the reference dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Dress Shirt Slim Fit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A slim fit men's dress shirt is highly relevant as it shares the dress shirt category, differing slightly in fit compared to the reference's trim and standard fits.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Traditional Untucked Fit Cotton Blend Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traditional untucked fit shirt made from cotton blend is somewhat casual and untucked fit contrasts with the dress shirt style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Steel Slim Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt with likely premium fabric, closely matching the reference product in dress shirt category and fit (slim/trim).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: &Collar Men's Slim Fit Moisture-Wicking Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit moisture-wicking dress shirt shares dress shirt form and a technical feature enhancing wear, similar use case as the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Trim Fit Premium Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit premium non-iron dress shirt nearly identical in function, fit, and construction to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Point Collar Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt but with point collar rather than semi-spread; still very relevant due to dress shirt form and fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's BeanFlex Twill Long-Sleeve Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: BeanFlex twill suggests a casual performance shirt rather than formal dress shirt, lowering relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Signature Stretch Poplin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Poplin fabric shirt with stretch indicates a dress or office shirt quality, relevant to the reference but fit/details unknown.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Awearness Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Ultra Performance Stretch Dobby Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt with performance stretch closely matches the category and functional features of the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Traditional Fit Herringbone Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traditional fit dress shirt with herringbone pattern - formal but different fit and pattern.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Knit Button Up Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Modern fit knit button up shirt likely less formal knit fabric, differing from woven non-iron dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Modern fit wrinkle-resistant dress shirt is similar in performance and category to reference but different fit terminology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Short-Sleeve Performance Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve comfort stretch performance shirt is more casual and definitely not a dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nordstrom Trim Fit Microcheck Cotton Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trim fit microcheck dress shirt is very relevant but has a pattern, still close to the reference dress shirt type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Chambray Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chambray fabric implies casual shirt rather than structured dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Van Heusen Men's Classic Fit Solid Poplin Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit poplin dress shirt matches the dress shirt category and solid fabric, different fit from trim/standard.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Brushed Jasp√© Twill Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Brushed twill is casual fabric and indicates a more casual shirt style than dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Kenneth Cole Men's Slim Fit Ultra Performance Stretch Plaid Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit performance stretch plaid dress shirt shares silhouette and function but has pattern and casual element.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's VentureStretch Woven Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Woven performance shirt likely casual and outdoor-oriented, less relevant as formal dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Slightly Fitted Moleskin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Moleskin fabric is casual and heavier, less typical for a dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Cloud Gauze Short-Sleeve Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeve gauze shirt is casual and more of a summer/leisure shirt than dress shirt.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: L.L.Bean Men's Comfort Stretch Oxford Short-Sleeve
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Comfort stretch oxford short-sleeve is casual and short-sleeve, not typical dress shirt silhouette.
